Theta rhythm and bidirectional plasticity in the hippocampus / James M. Hyman and Michael E. Hasselmo

Anatomical, physiological, and pharmacological properties underlying hippocampal sensorimotor integration
A face in the crowd : which groups of neurons process face stimuli, and how do they interact? / Kari L. Hoffmann

Cortical gamma band activity during auditory processing : evidence from human magnetoencephalography studies / Jochen Kaiser and Werner Lutzenberger
Neural coordination and psychotic disorganization / André A. Fenton

Summary of chapters, conclusion, and future targets / Christian Hölscher and Matthias Munk.

title: Information processing by neuronal populations
by_statement: edited by Christian Hölscher, Matthias Munk.
